bugSigSimple 0.99.2

  • Articles
    • UNKNOWN TITLE

Identify the most frequently recurring taxa in bugsigdb

frequencySigs.Rd

Identify the most frequently recurring taxa in bugsigdb

frequencySigs(sigs, n = 10)

Arguments

n

Number of top taxa to return
dat

data.frame produced by importBugSigDB
direction

One or both of c("increased", "decreased")

Value

integer vector of top most recurrent taxa

Examples

dat <- bugsigdbr::importBugSigDB()

#> Using cached version from 2021-04-09 17:04:19
sigs <- extractBugSigs(dat, direction = "increased", tax.level = "genus")
